comment.author: 37718677955@N01
comment._content: I remember seeing acts like this when I was a child in central texas in an aquifer fed natural spring.  The drinking under water was always a hit.  :-)

comment.author: 7680826@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called People in and around water, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 57366077@N00
comment._content: Looks a lot like Ginger Stanley, but hard to tell. She was more likely to be found at Silver Springs or, during underwater filming of Creature from the Black Lagoon, at Wakulla.

comment._content: I know the video - and it is unbelievable!
